definitions.text: a crease on the palm; its length is said by palmists to indicate how long you will live
support that enables people to survive or to continue doing something (often by providing an essential connection)
examples: the airlift provided a lifeline for Berlin
she offered me a lifeline in my time of grief

definitions.text: line that raises or lowers a deep-sea diver
line thrown from a vessel that people can cling to in order to save themselves from drowning
